mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.dianying_order_uuid_number as dianyingOrderUuidNumber ,a.dianying_id as dianyingId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.dianying_order_true_price as dianyingOrderTruePrice ,a.dianying_order_types as dianyingOrderTypes ,a.dianying_order_payment_types as dianyingOrderPaymentTypes ,a.changci_types as changciTypes ,a.buy_zuowei_number as buyZuoweiNumber ,a.buy_zuowei_time as buyZuoweiTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
